Detailed Description

Class representing a resource.

inlinevirtual

The name of this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its name

Load resource.

Parameters

◆ namespaceName()

virtual const char* rev::ResourceHandle::namespaceName ( ) const
inlinevirtual

The full namespace for this class.

Every subclass should redefine/override this property to return its full namespace. The built in logging methods will use this value for the message category

Reimplemented from rev::Object.

◆ removeFromCache()

void rev::ResourceHandle::removeFromCache ( bool  removeFromTopLevel)

Remove from resource cache structs.

Must make sure to lock resource cache's resource mutex before calling this

◆ setChildPaths()

void rev::ResourceHandle::setChildPaths ( const GString &  filepath)

Set child paths.
